title: Gun Goddess MF Bug
body: I don't know if anyone else is having this problem but when my games load with the **GG MF** skin being selected my **HUD** is completely inaccessible. It also bugs splats. I thought it was just a one time thing when it happened again to me just now. Both in ranked games though. :(

replies.body:
There is also a bug where the skin appears to cost twice as much as it's worth 

{{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}
Yeah this happens to me too when I use the GG MF skin

Hey hadiiwadii,
Could you do me a favor and update your graphics card and let me know if you're still having this issue? In addition, could you provide me with what OS you're using as well as how much usable RAM you have? Thanks! :)
